title: Lombo da Igreja
body: Lombo da Igreja is a populated place in the parish of Estreito da Calheta. It is usually divided into two places: Igreja Acima and Igreja Abaixo, according to their relative position to the Parish Church. In this place is the chapel of Nossa Senhora da Conceição, founded by André de França e Andrade around 1672, which was the headquarters of one of the largest estates in Madeira and was last administered by the 1st Count of Calçada (1812-1906).

André de França e Andrade: Founder of the chapel of Nossa Senhora da Conceição

1672: Foundation of the chapel of Nossa Senhora da Conceição
1812: Administration by the 1st Count of Calçada
